# This script is a component test script for use with the test firmware and printer.
ScriptHost::SetTimeoutMs(2000)
ScriptHost::SetQuitOnTimeout(1)
SDCard::Unmount()
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(NO CARD)
Serial0::WaitForLine(READY)
SDCard::Mount(./Test_Board_atmega2560_SDcard.bin)
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(CARD)
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY ff)
#Check idle state
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 01)
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 04)
#Check cmd8
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 01000001ff)
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 00fe400e00325b59000000807f800a40) #CSD
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 0100) #CMD12
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 0000) #CMD13
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 00) #CMD16
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 00c0000000) #CMD58
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 00) #CMD41
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 00) #CMD55
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 40) #17 with bad address
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY )
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 40) #24 with bad address
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(WRITTEN)
SDCard::Unmount()
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(CARD REMOVED)
#Check idle state
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY 7f)
SDCard::Remount()
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(CARD MOUNTED)
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY )
Serial0::NextLineMustBe(REPLY )
Board::Quit();
